llm_res.rule: symbol: Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success).
balanceOf function should return the account balance of another account with address _owner.
